title: Ezekiel clothing number one
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020825im_/http:/typophile.com/files/twhite_ezekiel_6117.jpg)

I know this is almost certainly custom.

BUT WAIT!!! DON’T LEAVE JUST YET!! I DO HAVE AN ID QUESTION!!

Let’s say I wanted to recreate this font. What font(s) could I use as a BASE to create a custom font like this?

Thank you.
author: dirtcastle

comments.content: May be having a look to [LetterHead Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020825/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/)...
Ah... good look on that link. I definitely see a few fonts I’m interested in. And the treatments are fantastic. Lots of inspiration. A good resource for this style.
